name: consumer-record-retrieval-test-app
description: NHS Digital NRL Consumer Record Retrieval Test App

scripts.preinstall: npm i -g ts-node newman copyfiles rimraf
scripts.copy-files: copyfiles "responses/*" dist && copyfiles "lib/static/*" "lib/assets/*" "lib/docs.md" "lib/docs.html" "dist" && copyfiles -f "dist-static/*" file-endpoint-mapping.tsv package.json package-lock.json dist
scripts.build: rimraf dist && mkdir dist && mkdir "dist/lib" && npm run make-doc && npm run copy-files && tsc --p tsconfig.prod.json

author: lionel.rowe1@nhs.net
